summary: Couple of craftable masks, based on dragonpriests masks.
descriptionHtml:
[size=50][b]Dexters Masks[/b][/size]
(v1.0)
Couple of new masks, based on dragonpriest mask \"Morokei\". Two are light armor, one is heavy armor.
Non-replacer mod. Don\'t worry about other mods, it should not affect them in any way.
The masks uses circlet slot and shows like circlet in inventory.

v 0.9
[i]Steel Mask[/i] - craftable, temperable
[i]Jeweled Mask[/i] - craftable, temperable
[i]Dwemer Mask[/i] - craftable, temperable
[i]Mask of Bthuand Mzahlf[/i] - not craftable, temperable (ENCH: +100% magicka regeneration, +150 magicka, waterbreathing)
More coming soon, I have some cool ideas... ;)

[b]Addon v 1.0[/b]
As I promised, here are two new masks. One is for underwater explorers and the second one is for those, who are afraid of the dark. Mage-friendly (no armor). The masks can be found in Nchuand-Zel Armory.

[i]Diver\'s Mask[/i] (ENCH: waterbreathing) not craftable, not temperable
[i]Mask of Nightvision[/i] (ENCH: night eye constant-effect when worn) not craftable, not temperable

Sorry, at the time, not beast-race friendly...

Special thanks to Psychosteve for the golden texture, from his perfect \"Psychosteves DragonPriest Masks\" 
skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4707


Installation
------------
Unzip in /Skyrim folder (the game\'s folder)


Uninstallation
--------------
Remove the \"masks.esp\" from /skyrim/data
Remove the \"mask.nif\", \"mask_jewel.nif\" and \"mask_jewel_kridla.nif\" from /skyrim/data/meshes/armor/dragonpriesthelms
Remove the \"dp_gold.dds\" and \"dp_gold_n.dds\" from /skyrim/data/textures/armor/dragonpriesthelm

Or use Nexus Mod Manager to installation and uninstallation of the mod.




[size=1]
Console codes:
Steel Mask 		...	xx000D62
Jeweled Mask 		...	xx000D64
Dwemer Mask 		...	xx000D66
Mask of Bthuand Mzahlf	...	xx000D6B
Diver\'s Mask		...	xx0012D5
Mask of Nightvision	...	xx0012D8
[/size]
author: JahDexter
